verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that on <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> as he taught <S%G1321><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> in the temple, <S%G2411><s%> and preached <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> came <S%G2186><s%> on him with the elders, <S%G4245><s%>
